content.query:
-- Copy data into call_center table
COPY INTO dbo.call_center
FROM 'https://tfsynapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsefs/data/call_center_clean.dat'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'),    FIELDQUOTE = '"',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0D0A',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '|'
);
GO
